title: Workshops for Teachers of Quantitative Methods for Social Science Undergraduates
abstractText: This project is for a series of workshops for teachers, or would-be teachers, of quantitative methods for undergraduate social science students. The workshops will feature expert speakers who will discuss a variety of issues with participants. There will be nine workshops over three years, all free to participants. Materials from the workshops will be distributed on the project website.The website will also host a blog for the discussion of quantitative methods teaching and an archive for teachers to share their course materials.
